eu.amidst.flinklink.core.learning.parametric

Interface BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ParameterLearningAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    dVMP, dVMPv1, ParallelVB, StochasticVI

    public interface BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm
extends ParameterLearningAlgorithm
    This interface extends ParameterLearningAlgorithm and defines the Bayesian parameter learning algorithm.
